title: I need advice
body: So, i got lagged out of my game for no reason, my internet was working fine, and then i close out of the game because it was not loading back. I log back into my account and i see that it takes me to the home menu even though i was in a game. I even checked na.op.gg and it said i was in a game still, but the client let me queue up for a new game. help me please

replies.body: The game ended while you tried to reconnect, likely. You cant join another game or even access the main menu or lobby while you are in a game.
the thing is tho that the game was only ten minutes in, there would be no way that would happen
na.op.gg is slow in updating, you might actually have just had the game while you dced? Check match history.

it says im still in game for op.gg
im so confused
op.gg is not a good way to check, theres a HUGE delay in updates, just ask a friend or whatever to check.

it wouldnt end at 10 minutes tho
thats y i am confused because i tried to load back and it was gone

idk then, there's a chance it was server side error, if that's the case everyone is forced out & it seems like the game doesn't exist, occurs when a major bug is occurring to prevent damage, or when the server for the game is shut down for any reason, (Eg if ranked Q's get closed during a game, it might lock you out if it was in the first few mins of the game)
